mapper.select: SELECT asset_year_month, deposit_account_cd, asset_amount, asset_remarks FROM asset ORDER BY asset_year_month DESC, deposit_account_cd;
SELECT asset_year_month, deposit_account_cd, asset_amount, asset_remarks FROM asset WHERE asset_year_month = #{assetYearMonth} AND deposit_account_cd = #{depositAccountCd};
mapper.update: UPDATE asset SET asset_amount = #{assetAmount}, asset_remarks = #{assetRemarks} WHERE asset_year_month = #{assetYearMonth} AND deposit_account_cd = #{depositAccountCd};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM asset WHERE asset_year_month = #{assetYearMonth} AND deposit_account_cd = #{depositAccountCd};
